name: TheWrap Element
text: GA FOOD Service is by far the top food delivery and food distributor in the SE US. Helping families all the way up to institutions with all their ready made high-quality meals on time with real ingredients.

name: Johnny Gilmore Jr
text: Friendly atmosphere and fast, courteous service!

name: glenn whitley
text:
Some of the food produced by GA (Sunny Meadows) is ok, but most of it is simply unpalatable.
These people should be ashamed of themselves. But I'm sure their not because they are making money through producing this garbage.

name: Kenneth Whitfield
text: Great services

name: Maeve Joi
text:
ZERO stars would be appropriate. The company believes it  can SUBSTITUTE SOMETHING just so long as they make the deliveries to people on the Disabled & Elderly Medicaid Waiver program (keeps people who would otherwise be in NURSING HOMES in their own home).  I quote several  of their Customer Svc people "AT LEAST YOU GET SOMETHING" but it's more so that GA Foods GETS PAID.
I have no problem with an OCCASIONAL SUBSTITUTION but have gotten them TWICE in the past month - instead of orange juice (as per CONTRACT) they substituted apple one week  & grape last week. So ok it's JUICE right? Both INCREASE my blood glucose levels. They are BEING PAID from FEDERAL & STATE FUNDS (taxpayers that is) that DEMAND FOODS MEET CERTAIN NUTRITIONAL STANDARDS.
I didn't post prior to now but this week's delivery was not only "just defrosted" it was DANGEROUSLY WARM - the ENTIRE BOX WAS DEFROSTED and WARM. The plastic containers had AN INCH OF WATER in them (I have photos) & cardboard partitions were soaking WET.
So I call CS and I'm told I will get new delivery on Friday. Glad I'm not TOTALLY dependent on these deliveries like SOME people ARE.
When I said that they need to CHECK THE TRUCK because it is obviously NOT maintaining temperatures to KEEP ITEMS FROZEN as demanded FOR FOOD SAFETY.
The CS rep says to me "We KNOW there is an ISSUE WITH THE TRUCK and it's NOT maintaining temperatures."
What the h€||§?! They KNOWINGLY DELIVERED DANGEROUS FOODS to the ELDERLY & DISABLED who DEPEND on the FOOD. Think about that...
They KNOWINGLY DELIVERED DANGEROUS FOODS to people WHO ARE FRAGILE when it comes to THEIR HEALTH.
What makes it even WORSE is THERE WAS A SUPERVISOR on the truck with the delivery driver!
But GA Foods attitude is "WELL WE GAVE YOU SOMETHING".
Yes SOMETHING LIKE FOOD POISONING.
Luckily I'm very AWARE of FOOD SAFETY and KNOW to NOT EAT THE FOOD but there are CUSTOMERS WHO DON'T KNOW BETTER.
Absolutely DISGUSTING BEHAVIOR by GA Foods. If it were up to me I would CANCEL THEIR CONTRACT IMMEDIATELY but alas I am just a lowly recipient.

name: TheWrap Element
text: GA FOOD Service is by far the top food delivery and food distributor in the SE US. Helping families all the way up to institutions with all their ready made high-quality meals on time with real ingredients.

name: Carol Naquin
text:
My medical insurance company ordered heart healthy meals and snacks for me after my hospital stay.  Federal Express delivered the box to my front door.  When my husband opened the box, the dry ice was completely gone and the items that were supposed to be frozen were melted and warm.

I called G.A. Food Services and the representative apologized and said "do not touch any of the food, throw it away".  The representative said they would send a second box and I should receive it on Friday, June 11, 2021.  I did not receive the box until today (6/14/2021).  The same issue, the dry ice was gone and the items in the box were defrosted and warm.  I called G.A. Foods and let them know.  They offered to send another box (for the third time) and I told them not to try to send any more food.  I asked them not to charge my insurance company for the unuseable food.  The representative said this was a issue between G.A. Food Services and Federal Express.

name: TheWrap Element
text: GA FOOD Service is by far the top food delivery and food distributor in the SE US. Helping families all the way up to institutions with all their ready made high-quality meals on time with real ingredients.

name: Aaron's Aquaculture
text: After having a knee replacement my insurance helped me order 4 weeks worth of meals to help in food prep while I was extremely limited in mobility and unable stand for doing food prep. We chose GA Foods. I received a call from GA Foods to organize a time for delivery so I could have someone here to receive. The meals were planned for the day after I came home from surgery. Then 2 weeks following. 3 weeks later no meals. Several calls and emails send with no reply from the company. Finally 3 and a half weeks later the first meals arrive send on standard 3 to 7 day postage (not 1 to 2 day shipping as promised) . Meals arrived after 4 days in shipping in summer, warm and no good. I was told they would be shipped 1 to 2 day FedEx shipping. Again no responses from the company. Highly recommend using a different vendor.

name: TheWrap Element
text: GA FOOD Service is by far the top food delivery and food distributor in the SE US. Helping families all the way up to institutions with all their ready made high-quality meals on time with real ingredients.

name: cheron fryer
text: i would rate these people a zero but it's not available.  The 1st week the driver never showed but put customer was not home in his records.  on another week no show and no call so i contact customer care and they said he will be here 2 days later and still no show, no call THESE PEOPLE HAVE YOU SITTING HOME WAITING FOR NOTHING, THIS COMPANY SUCKS!!!!

name: Amanda Vieth
text: What a great personality. Had us laughing and the food was amazing! Great place to pick up food to go! We will be back FOR SURE!

name: Shaquilla Sewell
text: This place is great! The food came out in a decent time and the staff is very friendly. I do wish it came with soup or salad though.

name: David Smith
text: Real good they give you a lot of food

name: Jessica P
text: Picked up some delicious lunch from hibachi joe today and it was DELICIOUS! The steak was perfectly cooked and that chicken couldn’t have been flavored better! Highly recommended!

name: Kaska Howard
text: This is THE BEST Hibachi place in Dothan AL! Joe definitely knows what he is doing and on top of that he is super nice and always greets people with a smile and a little joke here and there. Its takeout only but food can be ordered ahead of time and picked up.

name: Jason Brooks (Jmb3d)
text: Lots of food and is really good for take out. I would recommend eating here. You will have enough for at least two or three meals.

name: Noelle Sternberg
text: This place has great food. Came to Texas during our worst storm in year and made meals for the lower class. We are so thankfully and blessed. God bless you

name: Lydia “laceychilds” Childs
text: Food was really awesome, a little bit pricey, but excellent food and service.

name: Jordan Lopez
text: Great food and prices. The staff is great and very nice and helpful

name: Autumn Valentine
text: Amazing food!! Worth the money for the amount of food you get. Cant wait to eat it when I move back in a few months ❤

name: Candace J
text: Lovely folks, great service, clean place and the food is absolutely amazing!

name: Jason Bush
text: Stopped in and picked up a Supreme box with steak and chicken. After eating it felt compelled to leave a 5 star review. Everyone should give this place a try, will definitely be back for more!

name: Pauline Bradley
text: Sorry but the pics you see is not what you get.  Very nice people just don't expect much food for your 15.00 bucks. I would leave a pic but it won't let me.. I leave 3 stars because they are nice..

name: Matt
text: Butterfly! 🦋 the best yumm yumm ever!

name: Andrew Byrd
text: Joe came and catered lunch for our staff and did an outstanding job! The food was great and it was an awesome experience! I would highly recommend him!

name: Jessica Motley (Jessica Motley)
text: Habachi Joe’s is ALWAYS delicious and Joe is a phenomenal man who is always so friendly and giving to everyone he meets!

name: Kaycie Riley
text: Joe is very unprofessional and rude to his stuff. Terrible don’t recommend supporting this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your reviews.

name: Melissa Hix
text: Great food, fast service and very friendly

name: Phyllis Dickens
text: Best Hibachi in town and one plate is enough food for two.

name: Natasha Kennedy
text: Great food when Joe is cooking.

name: Josh C
text: A little pricey but gooood food.

name: Jeffrey Phillips
text: Great food. Friendly people. No complaints what so ever.

name: Paul Enloe
text: Fantastic Hibachi-to-go! Great customer service.

name: matthew quinn
text: Excellent steak and chicken!

name: Jennifer Dunaway
text: That yumyum sauce!!

name: Trisha Bain
text: Very pricey. I got an adult lunch & a kids, the adult had a side of cabbage, besides this, the portions were about the same.

name: Jessica Johnson
text: This place is more then I expected. The food is amazing.

name: tyrone thomas
text: Food good but very over priced.

name: wes davenport
text: Very good hibachi.

name: Layvonnia Hadley
text: Excellent!! Great service,  Joe is the best !!

name: Lavada Tellis
text: The Best!!!!!

name: Kathy Youngblood
text: Love it

name: Anne Martin
text:
First let me say I've been meaning to try this cute little cottage for quite some time. I finally decided today was the day. For those of us who live in West mobile or Midtown, there is a scenic drive to the cottage. It's no more than 15 - 20 minutes, just relax and enjoy the ride.

As soon as you pull into the driveway, you see this cute cottage.  But not until you're inside, do you realize, this is a such a gem.

Because we're still dealing with Covid-19, there is a sign on the door kindly asked did you wear a mask.

Once inside, you notice a beautiful  sitting area, coffee bar, a larger seating area, and an area set aside for unique and delicious treats.

Meredith and Lisa are so welcoming. The cottage had just a warm vibe and they're customer service was exceptional.

Reney's offers their packaged togo  butters in a refrigerated case. I was so impressed to see they offered other items, in the same case,  from local businesses and small business in the South. Such a generous thing to do.

I placed my order for the Chocolate Banana bread and they recommended Toffee butter. I picked up a coffee Velvet Ice Latte from PJ's Coffee (Spanish Fort, AL) out of the refrigerated case.

Let's go ahead and jump into this Banana bread and Toffee butter. WOW!! Yes, the warm banana bread was great. It was moist, delicious, full of flavor,  incredible!! But let me tell you about this Toffee butter, it was so light with little bits of toffee in the butter. I carefully, with reservation,  spread a small amount atop this incredible slice of banana bread. The first bite, what the what!!! I decided to go for it. Grabbed the knife and did what I know you would do, scooped, yes scooped, a dollop of butter onto the bread and leap to my feet in a happy dance.  The butter paired with the bread will make you want to take a step back or let's say a step towards the butter to spread more on top of that bread. Yummy!!

I decided while I was there to support some of the other local businesses by purchasing more than a few items. Cue the pictures :-)

I didn't notice until I got in the car to place my bags on the seat, a message "Keep Smiling" was written on the bag with my banana biread. Thanks Lisa.

I'm wrapping up this review because I'm going to the park to run 3.5 miles to burn off this Banana bread and Toffee Butter but it was worth it.

name: Jeannine Galloway
text: Awesome place.  Awesome staff. Very friendly and helpful.  First time there but not the last! Great butter!

resp.text: Yay!!! We were so glad you and the littles came in! Thank you for the review!! Hope to see you again soon!! 🎉🎉

name: Adrienne Tate
text: Love the homey feel you get when you walk in and are greeted with a warn welcome. The butter is AMAZING and they share the love by offering other local vendor products.

name: Jason Hebert
text: Muffins were amazing!

name: David Carpenter
text:
This stuff is highly addictive!  I keep trying different flavors, but every one I try becomes my new favorite!
What a great venue to market it as well.  Community, uniqueness, it is amazing in every sense of the word.  If you haven't stopped by yet, you are missing something!

name: Chris Snoeberger
text: Delicious!

name: Karen Rhodes
text: Chef Demonica was very professional and helpful in assisting me with my catering order. She delivered earlier than the sheduled time. The food was delicious!!! We are be using Potz & Panz for our next catering event! Thanks Chef Demonica and staff!!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and support...

name: Terrience Pugh
text:
One of the best restaurants in the world.
Hands down.

resp.text: Thanks for everything and your support...

name: Jacob Bowman
text: The wife and I had upset stomachs afterwards but the food was good and the service was great.

resp.text: I’m sorry that you had a upset stomach I wonder were it came from. Thanks for the feedback

name: sandra herrington
text: This is some deeeeeelicious Southern soul food prepared by two of the nicest women in town.  Portions are large but prices are not.  If you've not tried them, I urge you to do so.  If you can't get to the restaurant,  look for their food truck in downtown Montgomery.

resp.text: Thanks love we truly appreciate you...

name: J Jenkins
text: Never go wrong with great food and friendly people.  Haven't seen pancake biscuit since younger days in Mississippi. True home cooking

name: Tiffany W
text: Breakfast was amazing. The grits were almost as good as my momma's and they aren't stingy with the serving size. Those pancakes were bomb as well. Definitely go check them out.

name: Spencer Lee
text: The best black eyed peas I have ever had. Hamburger Steak was also good.  The owner was very friendly and they have a discount for folks such as state workers and military.   Not a great part of town but if that doesn't bother you then this works.

name: Vivian Simmons
text: Haven't been yet
